# Faculty-wise Report Cards (NEB +2)

Goal: Improve report card clarity.

Enhancements:
- Display Program name (Science / Management)
- Subject list grouped under Program
- Subject codes visible
- Credit hours visible
- Theory / Practical marks separate
- Final Grade + GPA

Layout:
- A4 printable
- School logo & header
- Student details
- Program prominently shown
- Principal signature footer

Rules:
- GPA formula unchanged
- Program is display-only layer
